entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
